rules:
    response-headers-pascal-case:
        x-tags:
            :
        description: Headers should be pascal-case. See Italian recommendation RAC_REST_NAME_003.
        message: Header {{error}}: {{path}}
        severity: hint
        recommended: true
        given:
            :
        then:
            function: casing
            functionOptions:
            type: pascal
            separator:
                char: -
